#summary Introduction to running znc on Windows
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

Open a new cmd.exe instance, navigate to the folder where znc.exe resides, type `znc --makeconf`, then follow the instructions. When you're done, simply enter `znc` and hit return to start the program.

Details about using modules, webadmin and so on can be found on the [http://en.znc.in/wiki/ZNC official ZNC website].
